title: My BBQ slow cooker chicken
ingredients: ['250ml tomato sauce', '150ml maple syrup', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce', '1 tablespoon soft brown sugar', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '3 teaspoons English mustard', '1 1/2 teaspoons paprika', '1 teaspoon turmeric', '3/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1/2 teaspoon onion granules', '1/2 teaspoon garlic granules', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '4 large chicken breasts']
